selection.name: Basic Party Package
selection.description: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper, 3 6' children's tables, 24 children chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

selection.name: Cotton Candy Package
selection.description: Includes: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings.

selection.name: Popcorn Party Package
selection.description: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper and 1 popcorn machine with 100 servings.

selection.name: Snowcone Package
selection.description: Includes: 1 13' x 13' jumper, 1 snow cone machine, 3 syrup flavors, 100 spoon straws, and 100 snow cone cones. PLEASE NOTE: ice is not included.

selection.name: Margarita Memories
selection.description: Includes: 2 sigle bowl margarita machines, 2 frozen margarita flavors, 100 9oz. tumblers, and 1 margarita salt rimmer.

selection.name: Cotton Candy Dreams
selection.description: Includes: 1 13'X13' jumper, 1 cotton candy machine with 100 servings, 3 6' children's tables, 24 children's chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

selection.name: Balloon Party 1
selection.description: Includes: 1 55cf helium tank, 75 balloons, 1 balloon ribbon roll, and 1 helium tilt adaptor. PLEASE NOTE:

selection.name: Balloon Party 2
selection.description: Includes: 1 helium tank 110CF., 200 latex balloons 11', 1 ribbon roll 350yd., and 1 tilt helium adaptor. PLEASE NOTE:

selection.name: Basic Party Package 2
selection.description: Includes: one 4 in 1 combo, 3 6' tables, 24 white samsonite chairs, and 12 helium balloons.

selection.name: Helium Birthday Balloon Bouquet
selection.description: Includes 6 11in printed helium balloons and 2 mylar 18in balloons.

selection.name: Balloon Colums 7'
